1.12.2.1.12.2-1.2.0.0:
Rewrote everything. Everything is now configurable.
Added a configuration GUI.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.1.1.0: Death chest coordinates are now sent in chat to the player who died.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.1.0.0: Fixed Cubic Chunks and Wearable Backpacks compatibility.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.0.3.0: The death chest no longer drops by default. This can be changed in the config.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.0.2.0: Changed the gamerule to "dontSpawnDeathChests", which is false by default.
